attributes.action: Enable the Victoria Cross veteran Gurkha now aged 80+ who has applied to come to the UK to do so.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I was surprised and disgusted to hear on the BBC radio on Friday evening 25 May that a Gurkha veteran, resident in Nepal has been refused permission to move to the UK. Apparently his application was refused by an official at the British Embassy in Kathmandu on the grounds that he did not have sufficient grounds.
This elderly veteran fought for this country, as thousands of his countrymen did and are doing, many of whom died. He  is already shabbily treated in respect of his pension but he should be allowed to immigrate to what he must consider to be his Mother country.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
